name: The Calcium Crusader in Boogietown
description:
Welcome to this randomly generated Disco-pocalypse!

You must RUN, FIGHT and BOOGIE your way throughout this adventure.

Includes

  • Music that makes you want to BOOGIE!
  • Random levels every time you play!
  • A never ending disco with big BOSS BATTLES! 

This game was solo developed in one month for Halloween 2022 and I had such a fun time creating it! If you like this game come and check out my others on my itch.io page. 

https://linktr.ee/sam.claydon

A special thanks to Dominic Beach who created the music for it!

https://linktr.ee/DominicBeach

You can also check out and download the original score here:

https://on.soundcloud.com/au5FZ

I created this project in the month of October 2022 and I used this asset pack to get me started off, I highly recommend it https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/4957

Known bugs:

  • Escape Button doesn't close the game anymore...... (it did about a week ago)
  • Sometimes The Calcium Crusader just goes flying in the air.... (I have no clue what they are doing up there)
  • Audio sometimes cuts out... but not all the time. (Thanks for being consistant Unity)
  • Ants.... (not in the game but are a known bug)
